entry.title: Live Javascript code in your docs
entry.summary: Here is a simple example of live code here in docusaurus:
entry.content:
Here is a simple example of live code here in docusaurus:

() => {
  return <div>Hello world</div>
}

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Hello! I am mostly creating these templates for myself. But anyone else is free to use them
entry.content:
Hello! I am mostly creating these templates for myself. But anyone else is free to use them as well. In many cases however you may be better off using the projects their based on directly.

For example this site uses Docusaurus and the settings I chose may not be right for you (such as using Typescript and including live code editing). It is also extremely easy to setup Docusaurus directly. Simply run':

npx create-docusaurus@latest my-docs classic
